summary: There are stories that stay with young long after you finish them. You return to thinking about them regularly. You think up new...
body: There are stories that stay with young long after you finish them. You return to thinking about them regularly. You think up new pieces of meta decade after publication. What are the stories that stay with you?

summary: Happy back to Hogwarts day fellow potterheads!
body:
Happy back to Hogwarts day fellow potterheads!

I feel like I don’t talk about my love for HP as much as I should on here, but this series has been with me for so long and actually helped me through a lot of bad times. Any other potterheads out here? 😁💕📚🔮

title: Still untilted part 4
body:
Part 1: https://sweetlialia.tumblr.com/post/177510217265/still-untitled

Part 2 : https://sweetlialia.tumblr.com/post/177546191245/still-untitled-part-2

Part 3 : https://sweetlialia.tumblr.com/post/177581447000/still-untiltled-part-3

The golden snitch has been caught less than thirty minutes ago, and for the very first time since the 1st of September, the Eight Years common room was full. Students who used to describe themselves as Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Slytherin or Ravenclaw were now celebrating their first victory under the colours of their United House. Everyone was talking loudly, kissing fiercely and mimicking one or another action of the game. All of the players were praised, even Goyle -who was told he was talented when playing by the rules. For the first time, they seemed to remember they had far more in common than being survivor of the same war.

Even Draco Malfoy seemed to be one of them that night, as he danced with Seamus and Pansy under the flamboyant cheers of Dean and Anthony, cheeks red from stolen firewhisky.  It was their first night as a team, as a House, and none of them felt out of place for what seemed an eternity. Only two boys could be caught faking it. Two black haired boy, keeping an eye on the same blond one, couldn’t truly feel the overwarming feeling as anxiety was nesting in their belly. Something wasn’t right. And yet, everything turned out alright that night. Ron was found kissing the right girl -unlike at his first Quidditch game-, Deamus were soon nowhere to be seen, Pansy and the Parvati twins were ‘updating’ their uniform as Draco was absentmindedly breeding Daphne’s hair, lazily arguing with Neville about sombral -or maybe unicorn, Harry couldn’t be sure as what he could hear of their exchange didn’t make any sense. It wasn’t the most common night, but they were seventeen, drunk and happy and mostly, they didn’t know they could somehow get along. It was all new and no one wanted to stain that first page. At least, that what Harry thought until he caught a glimpse of Zabbini taking Goldstein by the collar, leading him silently outside of the room.

“Don’t you ever dare to put a hand on him, am I making myself understood clearly enough?” Zabbini whispered.

“Or else what, are you gonna hex me? Hand me over one of your friends rotting in Azkaban?

-Try it and you’ll see.” The whispers had gone and the treat sends shivers down Harry’s spine.

“It’s common knowledge you guys had a fight. If he doesn’t want you anymore, I’m not going to wait until you move on.

-As if he could ever want you.” Disgust and pity, this guy was so predictable. “He’s wasted, not blind.

-No wonder why he drank that much.

-Meaning?

-Meaning?! He hasn’t talked to you, or looked at you since hours and I saw him smile more during this time-lapse than during the whole fucking day! He’s hot, it’s hard not to look at him, and it’s harder not to see how unhappy you make him. Do something great for once, and leave him alone. If you’re not going to make him happy, I’ll try my luck.”

Harry’s blood got him out of the shadow as he heard the thud noise of Anthony being flattened against the wall.

“Let him go.” His mouth ordered, his wand already out.

“Potter. Always noising in other’s business I see. Never thought of losing this bad habit?

-I said, let him go.

-Relax mate.” He smiled, as he turned around to face the other boy. “I’ve warned you.” He muttered between his clenched teeth. “And I’m not going to do it twice.”

“What happened?” Harry enquired as Zabbini disappear behind the door.

“It’s okay mate, don’t worry. He caught me pawing his boyfriend, that’s all. Slytherin Ice Prince, my eye.” He winked before getting back to the party.

Thank you for reading !

He’s hot, it’s hard not to look at him, and it’s harder not to see how unhappy you make him. Do something great for once, and leave him alone. If you’re not going to make him happy, I’ll try my luck.”

“What happened?” Harry enquired as Zabbini disappear behind the door.

“It’s okay mate, don’t worry. He caught me pawing his boyfriend, that’s all. Slytherin Ice Prince, my eye.” He winked before getting back to the party.

blog.description: I’m a 17 year Fangirl, I’m a table tennis playing flautist, Whovian, Halfblooded Hufflepuff, Ranger’s apprentice, Shadowhunting Avenger that’s divergent and survived the Maze and the Huger games. Who is quite a fan of Broadway despite living in Australia? I've also got FND making me legally blind and in a wheelchair amongst other symptoms. I’m not a great drawer but if anyone DMs me I’m happy to attempt any picture requests.

tags: i dont know if this had been said but idc
summary: out of all the things we love harry potter for, my favorite thing was the stories of kids who didn't have a home but found one...
body: out of all the things we love harry potter for, my favorite thing was the stories of kids who didn’t have a home but found one at hogwarts. kids like tom riddle and harry, the orphans. kids like sirius and snape, whose houses were never homes, kids like lupin and luna who were outcasts their entire life, all the people who never thought they’d BELONG and then found a place where they did are so important and a big part of the reason why “hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home” means so much to so many people

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

title: Kissing Fool

by miss_jad

Remus et Sirius surprennent deux filles en train de parler de la façon divine dont embrasse Sirius. Ceci conduit à quelques expérimentations et révélations surprenantes.
